website_summaries.verdict: Wipes contain extra moisture to help with muddy paws. Easy-to-use packaging delivers 1 wipe at a time.
pros: Safe to use around the pet's face and ears
Has a pleasant fragrance that is not overpowering
With these extra-moist wipes, owners can use fewer wipes to finish the job, saving money over the long run
cons: Product is not made in the United States

customer_reviews.title: Not offensive to cat noses!
customer_reviews.text: I've got three cats. That being said I know a little something about cats and their response to smells. I've used these wipes, liberally, on two of them and although they realize that somehow something "has happened" they check out the wiped area and continue their lives as normal. These wipes, at least with my cats, don't interfere with greeting; which if you are an avid cat lover you know involves the traditional "head butt" and the smelling, bonding, cleaning and grooming of each other that occurs in normal healthy feline families. Plus, they don't run from me when I'm coming at them with these so that's got to say something.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieCee

customer_reviews.title: My cats actually like this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im skeptical with any wipe products. One of my cats has issues with grooming. She is old and has no teeth. So I bought this to try out. She usually hates it when I tried to clean her or give her a bath. With this wipe, she didnt run away! I wiped her face and body down. No need to give her a bath. She liked it! Wow! I am so pleased with this product. Now my kitty is easy to clean. She is happier after I wipe her down too.
customer_reviews.author: feline_graduate_studentTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: clean paws with this wipe every night before my puppies go on to my bed~
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: These are great for your pupper
customer_reviews.text: These are great for your pupper! No scent, no dangerous chemicals, and no bad skin reactions. I use them for her butt and her paws, mostly, as well as her face. I’m careful to not touch her eyes or mouth with them, though I think it should be alright. Because every dog is different, to be safe I would apply the wipe minimally at first, wait 24hrs to make sure your pupper hasn’t had a reaction, and then decide how to use them. From my experience though, these are both safe and super useful. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Megsb

customer_reviews.title: Moist and large enough to clean dirty feet.
customer_reviews.text: I use wipes to clean off my dog's feet after walking him. I was using another brand that never seemed to clean well enough. I had to use at least two wipes per foot to get them really clean. Not with these. They are saturated enough to actually clean his feet completely. I can clean two feet with one wipe (he's a lab mix so he does have pretty big feet). I use one every now and then to wipe him down as well. They do a great job! They don't have any harsh smell and even seem to keep his allergies from flaring up. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than baby wipes for puppy!!
customer_reviews.text: My senior shih tzu was having some fecal incontinence and I was using baby wipes like crazy! I ordered these thinking they would probably be about the same... I don’t know what the difference is, but these seem to remove any residual poo from his fur SO much easier. I use fewer wipes and his hiney isn’t as sore or irritated. A win for mommy and puppy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Z. Kansas

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: After bringing our new puppy home and learning on my first puppy midnight potty break why everyone recommends using a create divider... I could not have been more greatful to have these cleaning wipes on hand. The wipes smell good, and the puppy didn't mind them at all. They saved me from giving the puppy a bath in the middle of the night, which is of irreplaceable value. I also used one on our cat who would take this over a bath any day! If you have a pet, they will get dirty at the least opportune times. It's great to have these just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: No list of ingredients, made in China. Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived shrink wrapped but cracked under shrink wrap. Can’t find ingredients listed anywhere on the box (made in China) so I don’t believe the “all natural” “non-toxic” etc claims. Didn’t bother opening damaged container, no list of ingredients means I’m not interested. I’ll buy the more expensive ones after all.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck. LOVE these grooming wipes. The size is great for multiple uses and great to freshen up and extend the time between baths. They get the job done. And they smelled good.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: ONLY ONE PACKAGE - NOT THREE
customer_reviews.text: I think one of the most frustrating issues with this particular product is that the photo is QUITE misleading. I thought I would be receiving 3 packets of wipes, not 1. They should really re-shoot this product with ONE package. I doubt they would sell as many, as the price is not worth the product. It doesn't have a pleasant or even clean scent, in fact, it smells rather bad and I feel guilty wiping that on my dog. Save your money here and buy a cheap store brand baby wipe!
customer_reviews.author: M.Shane

customer_reviews.title: perfect for its purposes
customer_reviews.text: We just added a new fur family member to our "clan". I was hopeful that these soft wipes would do the trick in keeping our new cat fresh and clean. He loves them (even the fragrance) and doesn't mind being gently worked over (as well as his bum cleansed) when he needs it. Handy to use, and the quantity is good for the price. Arrived on time and was adequately packaged. Nothing like a fur buddy that smells good too! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: milhausen

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! Sometimes my miniature dachshund gets a little messy when he goes #2; so I use these to wipe his bottom when he’s done. The wipes are awesome! They are Not too wet or too dry so they clean him very well! I get the “natural” as he is very sensitive to anything. I highly recommend this product and I will keep on ordering! Thank you Pupmate!!
customer_reviews.author: Winnarmb

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DRY
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY DRY! DO NOT BUY. I read the previous reviews and seen a couple mentioning the dryness and I thought maybe they got a bad pack of the wipes. Definitely not the case. DO NOT BELIEVE WHEN THEY ADVERTISE "EXTRA MOIST" it's false advertisement and should read EXTRA DRY. HIGHLY DISSATISFIED
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Deodorizing wipes for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wipes based on reviews of other buyers and I’m happy I did. My cat generally hates being cleaned but she reacted different to these wipes. She cleaned herself very little after which shows me the ingredients are good quality. I was concerned I may not like the scent since they’re called ‘PUPMATE’ but the scent of the wipes gradually dissipates right after on her fur to just a clean fresh scent (pretty much fragrance free). I definitely recommend them if you’re looking for gentle non-toxic wipes that really help clean your pet. I don’t regret buying these at all!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Propylene Glycol is extremely toxic to all felines!  Please don’t poison your cats.
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t poison your cats with this product!! Propylene Glycol is toxic to cats. It’s the second ingredient, which means the amount in each wipe is extremely high. Your cat is going to lick his/her fur no matter what. Therefore, he/she will ingest a large amount of an ingredient that is very toxic to all felines. I have a strong suspicion that the reason the ingredients aren’t listed on the product is because they would loose half their customer base.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Update on previous review-Pupmate per wipes
customer_reviews.text: When I originally ordered I didn’t notice you could order a natural(no scent) and scented, and accidentally ordered natural. Since I was expecting a scent to freshen my dog after being outside I was a little disappointed that there was no scent. Customer service reached out to me and offered to replace the item which I greatly appreciated. I was very happy with the scented product. They stay moist in container and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: OR

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are not thick. If you are getting these to wipe off your dog's paws, I would not recommend these. I had to use one wipe a paw due to having to double fold them. If you are using them to wipe them down, even then, they seem too thin but I could work for very small dogs or cats.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife happy life.
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging , easy popup My four-legged kids love to be pampered with them. I have a 11 month old chiweenie and a 10 month old Cheagle. When I wash them down they love their faces wiped and cleaned and their ears their bellies I feel like I have a massage parlor with them they just roll over can't wait for me to rub them down. Oh did I mention the wife is thrilled to death 😂 no doggy odors.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Grabusic

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: These have no effect on smell. I used 4 wipes on a 5lb puppy and you can barely smell it. I thought they would be good to use in between washing, but no. I’ll use them to clean her paws from mud or her backside when she needs it but am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MrBigGuy13

customer_reviews.title: This product delivers on all its claims
customer_reviews.text: The wipes eliminate odor on my dogs' fur. The ones I got were unscented, so no perfume-y scent, & no funky odor. The feel of the wipes is like cloth. They came packaged in a re-seal-able pouch inside a hard plastic dispenser. So far each wipe I've used is moist, hope that continues on down to the bottom of the stack (other wipes are dried out by the time I get to the last few).
customer_reviews.author: KPTirado

customer_reviews.title: Not wet enough
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is easy and functional, the scent is very light, not citrusy or flowery which we also enjoyed. Our biggest dislike with this product is the level of wetness these wipes have. While we understand wipes don’t replace a bath, wiping down 3 week old puppies with a little milk on their face should be easy peasy with wipes and It’s not with these. You’d have to use two per puppy just to wipe their faces clean immediately following drinking their weaning formula. I can’t even imagine trying to clean poopy paws during potty training 😳😳.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: German minpin, Roxie says thank for the pleasant wipe down!
customer_reviews.text: Roxie is a "senior" rescue with multiple health issues and, does not like be bathed, or for that matter even being brushed for more than a minute or two. That being said, she tolerated the Pupmate wipes very well, almost to the point of liking them. The wipes are a good size and very moist but, not wet, and leave her coat dander free and smelling pleasant. Great product that I would highly recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KREIN

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Dog Wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are good wipes. The biggest pauses for me were 1) unscented and 2) plastic box holder that keeps them moist after opening better. We have switched to regular baby wipes overtime, as these are much cheaper (1 pack of 100 as low as $1.49).
customer_reviews.author: EwokianQueen Parents

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, conditions fur - great product!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are amazing! Initially when snelling the scent which is definitely noticeable, I thought no way our cats are going to go for this. They do not like scented wipes or being wiped. But they actually like these wipes! Complete surprise! And their fur is so soft after using just once! Everybody is happy with this purchase. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Not wet enough wipes
customer_reviews.text: While these wipes may indeed be soft, they are certainly not moist enough to do a lot of good, especially with a dog such as mine who has long and thick fur. The humidity in my apartment is quite high naturally, so I don’t believe they got dehydrated after opening. I wish they were wetter— that way, they would do the job properly.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: wipes are great... packaging was sloppy
customer_reviews.text: The wipes themselves are great. Got the mud right off my pup, since I can't give him a bath right now it was perfect. However, the packaging was a little to be desired.. The hard plastic contain they can in was all busted up due to lack of packing around it. I thought it had actually ripped into the soft plastic, but it had not and the wipes were still moist. Had to find something else to put the wipes in.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I have two VERY LARGE ROTTWEILERS! and they get messy all the time when they go outside. These were wonderful, I did have to use two at a time for them simply because I needed that extra strength to wipe them down, but overall pleased with the smell and the dampness and the size of the wipes. The package has 100 wipes, so even using 2 at a time, I still think the package has plenty. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tester

customer_reviews.title: Not at all useful
customer_reviews.text: Would not dispense one at a time. Had to try to dig them out of the plastic box. When I could get something (opening was to sharp and jagged to use my fingers) to pry them out with I would then get a clump of wipes instead of one at a time. They did nothing to get rid of even slight doggy odor. They didn't have any deodorizing smell at all. Supposed to be baby powder scent but none was detectable. All in all was a complete waste of money. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Church

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was fast and product as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item through amazon prime, so it came within a couple days. The package came in a parcel and it was clean. The cleaning wipes were moist and worked as it should for cleaning away dirt on paws in a safe way. I liked how it didn’t have a strong fragrance, nor did it give it a rash to my dog and didn’t irritate my sensitive skin as well. It’s worth the money with the amount you receive in one package.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This product did exactly what I had hoped, provided an easy solution to muddy paws and a quick in-between-baths cleaning for my dog. My dog Lucy tends to be quite stinky, and while these wipes don't have deodorants, they helped keep her clean. My dog has very sensitive skin, so I was happy that the product is mild and has not bothered her allergies. The cloths are strong and can clean the rough pads of my dog's feet easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Gaytan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid grooming wipe.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, my cats love those than any other wipes on the market. This wipe is very easy to use and is tougher, larger comparing with other wipes I have tried. (I have tried wipes from Earthbath and Nature's miracle). My main issue with those wipes is that they tend to lose moisture pretty quickly over time. The last few wipes are always completely out of moisture. I've been using these for nearly two weeks and I will edit my post if it changes. Overall it is a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kima

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying different pet wipes for my dog, and this is the best one I have ever been used. I bought natural one so that there is no flavor with the wipe itself, and that's exactly what I want because for other brands of wipes I have used the smell is bad that I don't want to use it to make my dog smell worse. Also, the wipe is superrrrrr soft, which is good for a dog's pawn. The wipe also comes with a box that helps to keep the wipe moisturizing. I would buy it again and I would like to try the other flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: Cats can be picky. However, she is surprisingly ok with the wipes. I guess my cat loves the wipes for sure. Whenever I pull out the wipes, she will come to me quickly. I think she has a good experience with the wipes. Also, it smells good.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Nothing terrific nothing terrible. I see why others rated that they were dried out. Not quite—but not all that soaked either. I’ve used a few so far and initially, my fuzz baby tolerated it. Second time he wasn’t quite as pleased. I’ll keep trying and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: *sparkles*

customer_reviews.title: Ad showing 3 boxes is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are as good as any wipes but the price is outlandish and I won't be buying again. Granted I purchased hurriedly and didn't notice that only one box was included, but I felt the ad showing 3 boxes was deliberately misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Poirot

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any pet owner.
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes. My Maltipoo hates a bath so we go long stretches in between and these wonderful wipes are just what we needed to keep her fresh. She enjoys the coolness of the wipes and I am pleased with the moisture content.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received these wipes. I bought them because Sofie's Secret wipes were no longer available. They were the best. These are so much smaller & I'm finding that I'm using multiple wipes on my senior cats than I was before. I can tell these won't last long. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SteelersGirl911

customer_reviews.title: Great for fur baby spot cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wipe my fur baby paws off before getting in my bed. They’re moist enough to get them clean. I have a Maltese, so the wipe is more than big enough to wipe his paws, wee wee, and body with 1 wipe if need be. Not crazy about the scent though. I would be fine with unscented wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunte'

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective dog wipes for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dog wipe! The right size and amount of moisture and the smell is not overpowering. Our dog is not the biggest fan of getting wiped down (then again... what dog is?) but these work very well for our day-to-day needs such as wiping down paws after a walk or a quick clean of her fur to help with my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes my pups get a bit dirty while playing in the yard but a full bath isn’t necessary. That’s when these wipes come in handy. They are thick, moist and clean well. I really like the plastic box they come in. They dispense easy out of it and the box fits nicely in a nook by our back door.
customer_reviews.author: Chamaole

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like these. Took in a stray kitten that smelled like a gutter rat. These were a tremendous help since bath time was a no go. Also, she's still learning how to properly use a litter box without stepping in her waste, so these are used regularly on her little paws. Only docked a star because my product came damaged--the tub is broken and cracked.
customer_reviews.author: MissShelbyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Very dry and poor cleaning ability
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are too dry to do anything. I had to use them with a spray to be able to clean my dogs paws. It took several wipes to clean anything. It's easier to use a towel and spray. Don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wipes but thin and pricey
customer_reviews.text: I got these to see if they were a lot better for my pup than the baby wipes I had been using. They are nice and slippery so it’s easy to wipe dirty paws, but in the end it’s not worth it. Smaller and thinner than the huggies natural care baby wipes I get in a humongous box from Costco, and when I opened the bag the entire thing tore open to the end so I was afraid they would dry out even in the plastic dispenser box.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: might be fine for smaller dogs with less need for a rigid ...
customer_reviews.text: tissues are a bit flimsy for a larger dog, might be fine for smaller dogs with less need for a rigid more durable wipe
customer_reviews.author: niloc

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known earlier
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I have not had to literally give my cat a bath. I wanted something to freshen him up. He does not fight me using these wipes. That in itself is enough said, because he does not like water anywhere except in his water bowl. I am glad I stumbled upon these. Good product, fair price, all is good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are ok. The container stinks. A lot of times more than one wipe pulls out and its hard to get them back into the bag. It would be way better if it was a hard plastic box with a lid instead of a bag with a little hatchway.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My dog, who gets filthy during every walk, loves these wipes. They smell good and don't hurt his eyes, nose, paws or skin. They're the perfect size and are strong. They don't fall apart and stay damp. Item exactly as pictured and was delivered on time. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bartkovich

customer_reviews.title: Perrrfect 😂 for my two cats who hates bathe
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say it's wipes for animals. 😂 we have to male cats, one loved being wiped down while my other hated it. But, it is worth the buy. Since our cats hates baths this makes it so much easier to maintain their smells and their coats are shiny
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: They are strong yet pliable. Smell great without being overpowering (in fact could frangance be a bit stronger?) big enoug as well for a quick clean. I use them always for paws, tush face, every time we come back from outside. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: mkd18

customer_reviews.title: totally dislike this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog recoiled from this product. It is so heavily perfumed it has got to overwhelm any dog's sensitive nose. I am going to use unscented baby wipes instead.
customer_reviews.author: jpk

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but thin
customer_reviews.text: The price is good for how many you get, but I wish they were thicker. It’s hard to get stuff off of my dog that’s really stuck on her fur from running around the backyard with these wipes. But otherwise they’re fine. Just wish they were thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Pernack

customer_reviews.title: So far so good (although my cat may disagree)
customer_reviews.text: It's good so far. It doesn't get rid of yucky poo stuck on cat's rear end. It won't replace washing/bathing the cat's rear hair, but for minor dirt removal, it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Great on White coat!
customer_reviews.text: I have a white Shepherd who loves playing outdoors and running through the woods as such it is extremely difficult to keep her clean, these pet wipes work great in between baths and grooming to help her not only keep a clean looking coat but she also smells fresh after a quick wipe down. These wipes make it so she isn’t in constant need of a bath and are really worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Grfn21

customer_reviews.title: Good Pet Wipes
customer_reviews.text: We use these to clean our dogs paws after a walk, and they work great for this purpose. Maybe a little small for a full body wipe, but that is not what we use them for... so they are fine for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: WaywardSand

customer_reviews.title: There wipes what can I say.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived quickly. I like that it the wipes don’t irritate my little pup. It’s smells lovely. I like the case better than the pack that just needed to be resealed. The case definitely keeps the wipes moist.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great. My boy likes to poop on top of ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. My boy likes to poop on top of small shrubs (he's special) and ends up getting a turd rolling off the bush onto his leg. I always have to carry these and give him a quick cleaning. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Works Beyond Expectations
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are amazing. It's pollen time in AR & my pup loves the outdoors. By the end of the day, he is filthy. I also mix wet food with his dry food, which causes his beard to turn dark & gunky. I put a wipe in each hand & rub him all over, as if I were giving him a massage. He loves it & in no time, he is clean. He looks better, feels better, & you can see by the pics how much whiter his beard, etc. are after using these wipes. They are large, thick, & no odor. Riley & I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Dean

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: These are more on the dry side, not good for grooming purposes at all. Will not repurchase but will find a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Leifker

customer_reviews.title: Sweet smell of James.
customer_reviews.text: We got James the cat from the shelter, and he did not smell so good, tried washing him in sink but couldn’t finish as he jumped out, But the wipes work great, he smells very nice now. No smell.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Kulick

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great for my pup’s paws. The scent is nice and I love the thickness of the wipe itself. They came in a plastic pop top container, I personally love this convenience. I’m excited to keep my floors more clean between mopping by being able to wipe my pups paws when we come in from outside.
customer_reviews.author: kkerriga

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried others on my yorkies who have allergies but these are much better. Easy to dispense, smells great, no residue and safe for my babies ( they’re lickers)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Does It’s Job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my Chiweenie who likes to run around in the dirt everyday. It’s not a replacement shower, but it does it’s job of wiping off dirt. The scent smells nice, but it didn’t remove the dirt odor from his paws. I think its best for small dogs/puppies who don’t get as dirty ofter or a lot and needs a quick wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Great for animals!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these are so soft!!! I have a long haired pup and just used these after his bath and they work great!!! They are unscented and don’t have that chemical smell to them. The container comes with 100 wipes and it definitely will last for a while. Would definitely recommend and will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: China Becker

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as the description says.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these wipes. I use them for my dogs paws, pee-pee, and butt. Two complaints, they are not thick like is advertised, and they aren't that moist, causing me to have to wet them a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The wipes work well.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the wipes!! My puppy likes playing in the yard but she is not a fan of bath. So before getting into house, we will wipe her down. The wipes work well. They can clean her up. Great helpers for me!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves these
customer_reviews.text: I use these wipes to wipe my puppy down every night before bed. She's 16 weeks and has very itchy skin. She's very picky about what you put on her, but she loves these wipes. When I grab the container she starts wagging her tail and jumping around like she's getting a treat. It's the cutest thing. They really keep her smelling great. It's not too strong of a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: very nice product
customer_reviews.text: i run a large wildlife center and we use these wipes on our neonate orphaned animals. they are soft and do not irritate the babies when we clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Searles

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle and soft!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are very gentle. I have used them on kittens and our 19 yr old cat. She has an eye that sometimes weeps and these wipes are soft and gentle enough for her.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We have 2 kittens that have long hair and these pet wipes keep them clean and help clean up any kitten messes! One of our kittens are white and I never realized how hard it would be to keep her so clean and white! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Grooming wipes
customer_reviews.text: Great for clean my pets paws are a fun day at the doggy park I also use them to clean his body if he get muddy or dirty so I don’t have to have a dirty or muddy car there are very easy to use and great for any pet owner
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good scent, soft dog wipes
customer_reviews.text: Overall these wipes are pretty good for the price. They aren't very thick though, so when I wipe my dogs paws after being in the dirt, I typically need more than one. But they seem to clean up their paws pretty well and will help me keep my floors much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are very convenient and easy to use but they don’t seem to clean my puppy’s fur very well. I’ll give them a bit more time to see if they’ll work better.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Tippett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome (:
customer_reviews.text: Cannot be any happier I bought these! It’s not only easy to use but it’s soft, quickly comes out of the box without causing me any struggle, and they smell great!
customer_reviews.author: MaeMae

customer_reviews.title: My Kitty is Grateful!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty needs extra attention due to a medical issue. I can grab the wipes really easy from the box, kitty likes them and she no longer has to go to the vet as frequently because she is squeaky clean!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McRae

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know we needed these!
customer_reviews.text: We love these pet wipes! They keep our fur baby smelling less "doggy" and fresh between baths. They're really soft and she doesn't seem to mind being wiped down. I like that they don't have a perfume scent, just clean-scented.
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not for really fluffy animals
customer_reviews.text: I got these for an elderly small dog who was soiling herself, too try and clean her up and keep her comfortable. Didn't do a very good job. Less "bath-like" than I had expected. Still, not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: nomadheart

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Minimal scent - my cat is okay with it. Didn’t have any problems with this. However nonalcoholic baby wipes work just as good for me and can be easily found in any store, so I will probably not purchase this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Yukun Yu

customer_reviews.title: Good job when need a quick fix
customer_reviews.text: These work really well when you need to wipe your dog's paws before getting in the car or coming in the house. It doesn't replace a bath, but works well when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenN

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the smell!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wipes! I love the smell! it is unbelievably pleasant! these wipes are such a savior! I just wish they were cheaper! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good product for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell, the softness, and ease of using. They work well for my dog. However I ordered the ones with Aloe Vera the last time. I would have preferred those.
customer_reviews.author: LOUISIANA

customer_reviews.title: This is the product to use in between baths
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I bought this for my daughter for her dog he’s a little too big to be put into the bathtub. This product she says is great and thanked me for it. I would definitely order from this seller again thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like that the wipes are thick. However, they are not as moist as it claims and it's a lot smaller than other wipes I've used.
customer_reviews.author: yellowspectrumxx

customer_reviews.title: Could use baby wipes
customer_reviews.text: Like baby wipes but for pets. Good wetness and quality. Could probably use baby wipes but I was worried about them being too too wet for a cat
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Soft but durable pet wipes
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are perfect for my mom's papillon!! She loves jumping through puddles and needs her paws wiped before coming back into the house, as well as the ends of her fur. These are perfect for cleaning her up after walks instead of always needing to bathe her daily !!
customer_reviews.author: Marie C.

customer_reviews.title: Gently do the job
customer_reviews.text: I have a Yorkie prone to watery eyes which then form crusts in her fur. These wipes do better than the others at removing them gently.
customer_reviews.author: retired lady

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and nice size wipes
customer_reviews.text: I can’t bath my puppy everyday, so these wipes get her very clean and fresh in between baths. They work great and smell so fresh and clean. They do not irate her skin and I use them on my cat as well.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: So easy a 3 year old can do it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 80+lb dogs. They are NOT easy to bathe. The day these wipes arrived it had been raining and they all wanted to go out. They came in smelling like wet dog so it was the perfect test! My daughter and I wiped all three down (my 3 year old can help!!) and the smell was gone! While the wipes aren't scented heavily, it nuetralized the odors! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Pattison

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice to use. The softness and fragrance are awesome. They are a tad bit more moist than normal wipes. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: June L.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle & effective
customer_reviews.text: Needed a really soft wipe for our 7 lb. pup who is battling cancer and is very, very sensitive. These wipes totally deliver. They are thick and gentle and have a nice, soft scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mama T

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cleaning my elderly cat
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with my purchase. I bought them for my elderly cat who can’t clean himself well anymore. Seem to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Cath

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has pretty bad seasonal skin allergies, so in the spring & summer months, she is constantly scratching and chewing her skin. Ever since I started using these aloe vera wipes, her fur has been softer and she has stopped scratching! I've never used anything that worked so well for her, and the price point is also a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quick Clean Up for My Dogs
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason my pups love to roll around in stinky yard stuff as soon as I give them a bath. These wipes have saved us from having to do a 2nd and 3rd bath. The smell is very subtle and fresh so it doesn't give us all headaches when we use. The wipes are a bit thicker so quite a bit more durable than others I've used. Will definitely purchase these wipes again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Tina T

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Soft to touch. Feel soft to my hand. My dog didn’t hate the smell. I like it so far and for sure will continue buying it
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these pet wipes for my mix Pit, and it’s pity they stopped making this. these are thick, one wipe is enough to clean her everyday before she goes to Bed, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Vidya

customer_reviews.title: Great product - fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I needed some wipes for my pups feet so that she wouldn't be walking into the apartment with dirty paws. These are great and she lets me take care of her without a problem. They are wonderful to use and I totally recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: N319Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick, and so useful!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are perfect for doggie paws and faces! The wipes are soft and thick, with no noticeable scent. I use them to clean my dogs’ paws when they come in from outside, and they work great! I’ve also used them on the dogs’ faces, with no irritation. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KJH21399

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of these wipes. It’s very light and my dogs don’t seem to be off put by it. I will continue buying them! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These wipes really work. Surprisingly they are not super wet when you feel them but when I wipe down my 3 month old standard poodle it cleans her very good. It leaves a clean scent on my pup of course she’s a dog so she isn’t going to be smelling like a garden of flowers but for a dog wipe I think it does a great job with the scent. Will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and size.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great. They pop up, are thick enough and smell very nice. They are also much larger than others I've seen advertised. My dog seems to like them too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick and they scrub better than others!
customer_reviews.text: These have a thicker texture than other brands and scrub better. They also have a light clean scent. Will always use this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

product_meta.title: PUPMATE Pet Wipes for Dogs & Cats, Extra Moist & Thick Grooming Puppy Wipes with 100 Fresh Counts, Aloe Vera/Nature
feature_bullets: Natural dog wipes with extra moisture and thickness are for dogs and cats' coats, paws, feet, butt and bodies. They can also be used as dog bath wipes.
This grooming wipes for dogs & cats, puppies & kittens contain fresh Aloe vera & Vitamin E.
The doggie wipes puppy paw wipes are soft and comfortable,
Our paw wipes are for your dog's paws after daily walking.
